Verses: 1  ippadiyirukka, Sagodharare, Neengal Evaigalai Ariyavendumendrirukkirenendraal; Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalellaarum Megaththukkuk Keezhaayirundhaargal, Ellaarum Samuththiraththin Vazhiyaai Nadandhuvandhaargal.
2  ellaarum Mosekkullaaga Megaththinaalum Samuththiraththinaalum Gnaanasnaanampannappattaargal.
3  ellaarum Ore Gnaanapojanaththaip Pusiththaargal.
4  ellaarum Ore Gnaanabaanaththaik Kudiththaargal. Eppadiyenil, Avargalodekooda Sendra Gnaanakkanmalaiyin Thanneeraik Kudiththaargal; Andhak Kanmalai Kiristhuve.
5  appadiyirundhum, Avargalil Adhigamaanapergalidaththil Dhevan Piriyamaayirundhadhillai, Aadhalaal Vanaandharaththile Avargal Azhikkappattaargal.
6  avargal Ichchiththadhupola Naamum Pollaangaanavaigalai Ichchiyaadhapadikku, Ivaigal Namakkuth Thirushtaandhangalaayirukkiradhu.
7  janangal Pusikkavum Kudikkavum Utkaarndhu Vilaiyaadavum Ezhundhirundhaargalendru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Avargalil Silar Vikkiragaaraadhanaikkaarar Aanadhupola Neengalum Aagaadhirungal.
8  avargalil Silar Vesiththanampanni, Orenaalil Irubaththumoovaayiram Per Vizhundhuponaargal; Adhupola Naamum Vesiththanampannaadhiruppomaaga.
9  avargalil Silar Kiristhuvaip Pareetchaipaarththu, Paambugalaal Azhikkappattaargal; Adhupola Naamum Kiristhuvaip Pareetchaipaaraadhiruppomaaga.
10  avargalil Silar Murumuruththu, Sangaarakkaaranaale Azhikkappattaargal; Adhupola Neengalum Murumurukkaadhirungal.
11  ivaigalellaam Thirushtaandhangalaaga Avargalukku Sambaviththadhu; Ulagaththin Mudivukaalaththilulla Namakku Echcharippundaagumpadi Ezhudhappattum Irukkiradhu.
12  ippadiyirukka, Thannai Nirkiravanendru Ennugiravan Vizhaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirukkakkadavan.

13  manusharukku Neridugira Sodhanaiyeyallaamal Vere Sodhanai Ungalukku Neridavillai. Dhevan Unmaiyullavaraayirukkiraar; Ungal Thiraanikku Melaaga Neengal Sodhikkappadugiradharku Avar Idankodaamal, Sodhanaiyaith Thaangaththakkadhaaga, Sodhanaiyodukooda Adharkuth Thappikkollumpadiyaana Pokkaiyum Undaakkuvaar.
14  aagaiyaal Enakkup Piriyamaanavargale, Vikkiragaaraadhanaikku Vilagi Odungal.
15  ungalaip Puththimaangalendru Ennip Pesugiren: Naan Sollugiradhai Neengale Nidhaaniththup Paarungal.
16  naam Aaseervadhikkira Aaseervaadhaththin Paaththiram Kiristhuvinudaiya Raththaththin Aikkiyamaayirukkiradhallavaa? Naam Pitkira Appam Kiristhuvinudaiya Sareeraththin Aikkiyamaayirukkiradhallavaa?
17  andha Ore Appaththil Naamellaarum Panguperugirapadiyaal, Anegaraana Naam Ore Appamum Ore Sareeramumaayirukkirom.
18  maamsaththinpadiyaana Isravelaraip Paarungal; Baligalaip Pusikkiravargal Balipeedaththode Aikkiyamaayirukkiraargalallavaa?
19  ippadiyirukka, Vikkiragam Oruporulendrum, Vikkiragaththukkup Padaikkappattadhu Oru Porulendrum Naan Sollugireno?
20  agngnaanigal Baliyidugiravaigalai Dhevanukku Alla, Peygalukke Baliyidugiraargalendru Sollugiren; Neengal Peygalode Aikkiyamaayirukka Enakku Manadhillai.

21  neengal Karththarudaiya Paaththiraththilum Peygaludaiya Paaththiraththilum Paanampannakkoodaadhe; Neengal Karththarudaiya Pojanapandhikkum Peygaludaiya Pojanapandhikkum Pangullavargalaayirukkakkoodaadhe.
22  naam Karththarukku Erichchalai Moottalaamaa? Avarilum Naam Balavaangalaa?
23  ellaavatraiyum Anubavikka Enakku Adhigaaramundu, Aagilum Ellaam Thagudhiyaayiraadhu; Ellaavatraiyum Anubavikka Enakku Adhikaaramundu, Aagilum Ellaam Bakthiviruththiyai Undaakkaadhu.
24  ovvoruvanum Than Suyapirayojanaththaith Thedaamal, Piranudaiya Pirayojanaththaith Thedakkadavan.
25  kadaiyile Virkappadugira Edhaiyum Vaangip Pusiyungal; Manasaatchiyinimiththam Neengal Ondraiyum Visaarikkavendiyadhillai.
26  boomiyum Adhin Niraivum, Karththarudaiyadhu.
27  andriyum Avisuvaasigalil Oruvan Ungalai Virundhukku Azhaikkumpodhu, Poga Ungalukku Manadhirundhaal, Manasaatchiyinimiththam Ondraiyum Visaariyaamal, Ungal Mun Vaikkappadugira Edhaiyum Pusiyungal.

28  aayinum Idhu Vikkirakangalukkup Padaikkappattadhendru Oruvan Ungalukku Sonnaal, Appadi Ariviththavanimiththamum Manasaatchiyinimiththamum Pusiyaadhirungal, Boomiyum Adhin Niraivum Karththarudaiyadhu.

29  unnudaiya Manasaatchiyaikkuriththu Naan Ippadi Sollaamal, Matroruvanudaiya Manasaatchiyaik Kuriththe Sollugiren. En Suyaadheenam Matroruvanudaiya Manasaatchiyinaale Kutramaai Ennappadavenduvadhenna?
30  melum Naan Adhai Sthoththirippudane Anubaviththaal, Sthoththiriththu Anubavikkira Porulaikkuriththu Naan Dhooshikkappaduvaanen?
31  aagaiyaal Neengal Pusiththaalum, Kudiththaalum, Edhai Seydhaalum, Ellaavatraiyum Dhevanudaiya Magimaikkendru Seyyungal.
32  naan En Suyapirayojanaththaith Thedaamal, Anegarudaiya Pirayojanaththaith Thedi, Avargal Ratchikkappadumpadikku, Evvidhaththilum Ellaarukkum Piriyamaai Nadakkiradhupola,
33  neengalum Yoodharukkum, Kirekkarukkum, Dhevanudaiya Sabaikkum Idaralatravargalaayirungal.
